author: Karen Mulholland
method: Preheat the oven to 160C/325F/Gas 3. Mix all of the ingredients together in a lidded ovenproof dish and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Cook in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until the sausages are cooked through. Serve with mashed potato or crusty bread.
ingredients: 1  spring onion, sliced,  30g/1oz cooked cannellini beans,  1 cabbage leaf, chopped,  2 tbsp tinned chopped tomatoes,  2 cooked sausages, sliced,  75ml/3fl oz stock,  ½ tsp wholegrain mustard,  few stalks fresh thyme, leaves only
